alert.note: Alert for Fallon (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 02 at 6:35PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Fallon County through 745 PM MDT... At 634 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 24 miles southeast of Fallon to 19 miles northwest of Ekalaka. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph, heavy rain and pockets of pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Baker, Plevna, Ollie, Westmore and Willard. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
